description: a(n) = product of first n triangular numbers (A000217) + 1.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,100
maple: for n from 1 to 30 do printf(`%d,`,1+product(j*(j+1)/2, j=1..n)) od:
prog: (PARI) { for (n=1, 100, if (n>1, a=(n*(n + 1)/2)*(a - 1) + 1, a=2); write("b061213.txt", n, " ", a) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 19 2009]
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 21 2001
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Apr 24 2001
OFFSET changed from 0,1 to 1,1 and EXAMPLE corrected by _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 19 2009
